Operator# *=(_:_:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static func *= (a: inout Self, b: Self.Scalar)
```

Available when `Scalar` conforms to `FixedWidthInteger`.Deprecated

integer vector types do not support checked arithmetic; use the wrapping operator '&*=' instead
